eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Cottonwood, MN; AT 08:05 AM ON SEP 08, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:20 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the IPAWS system. If this was an actual emergency, further instructions would be listed.
